impact-statement: The <italic>Botryllus schlosseri</italic> genome yields insights into the evolution of hematopoiesis.

competing-interest.conf2: The other authors declare that no competing interests exist.
competing-interest.conf1: Stanford has filed US and International patent application numbers 61/532,882 and 13/608,778 entitled “Methods for obtaining a sequence” with inventors AV, DP, and SRQ. DP and SRQ are co-founders of Moleculo Inc.

equal-contrib.equal-contrib: These authors contributed equally to this work

contribution.con1: AV, Conception and design of genome project, development of a novel genomic library construction method (long read sequencing- LRseq), genomic and RNA-seq library preparation, chromosome isolation and library preparation, genome assembly, genome assembly evaluation, gene annotation, comparative genomic analysis, writing of manuscript
contribution.con2: NFN, Conception and design of genome project, development of a novel genomic library construction method (long read sequencing- LRseq), genomic and RNA-seq library design and preparation, high-throughput sequencing, writing of manuscript
contribution.con3: DS, Conception and design of genome project, genome assembly, genome assembly evaluation, gene prediction and annotation, comparative genomic analysis, phylogenomic analysis, development of an integrated <italic>B. schlosseri</italic> genome and transcriptome database searching and genome browser website
contribution.con4: AMN, Gene prediction and annotation, comparative genomic analysis, phylogenomic analysis, development of genome analytical tools, writing of manuscript
contribution.con5: DP, Conception and design of genome project, development of a novel genomic library construction method, (long read sequencing- LRseq), genomic library preparation, genome assembly
contribution.con6: WK, Genome assembly, chromosomes assembly and chromosome assignment
contribution.con7: BP, Transcriptome assembly, gene prediction and annotation, high-throughput sequencing
contribution.con8: CHF, Single chromosome isolation and single chromosome library preparation
contribution.con9: GLM, Genomic and RNA-seq library preparation and high-throughput sequencing
contribution.con18: ILW, Conception and design of genome project, writing of manuscript
contribution.con19: SRQ, Conception and design of genome project, development of a novel genomic library construction method (long read sequencing- LRseq), writing of manuscript

contribution.con13: FG, Mitochondria DNA Sanger validation and mitogenomic phylogeny
